title: Clear Quartz - Small Raw Crystal
description: Clear Quartz - Small Raw Crystal Clear quartz is peak energy & comes with insane vibrations. Literally buzzing! Use clear quartz to enhance other healing crystals you are using in
cleaned_text: Clear quartz is peak energy & comes with insane vibrations. Literally buzzing! Use clear quartz to enhance other healing crystals you are using in your spiritual work. Best used to knock out negative energy and courage the positive. We suggest getting multiples or sizing up to amplify the healing crystal's purpose. Also available in a [small](/products/clear-quartz-small-healing-crystal) & [large](/products/clear-quartz-large-healing-crystal) [ size](/products/orange-calcite-large-healing-crystal)! Associated chakras: Crown. Associated zodiac: All of 'em babe! Multiple crystals pictured, listing is for one crystal. Crystals are not subject to further discount at this time. Origin: Imported.
